context: She was given IV hydration and was started on Reglan 10 mg orally q.i.d. and a clear liquid diet. She is feeling significantly better this morning and is anxious to leave and said she would leave AMA if we did not discharge her. At this point she is comfortable and medically stable for discharge on Reglan 10 mg q.i.d., as well as Protonix 40 mg daily.
